author: gdamour
msg: The issue was that the CMP GBeanData containers must be defined by the
same Configuration such that instances shared by the two containers, e.g.
CacheTable, are still shared even after serialization and unserialization.

author: dain
msg: Child configurations are now included in the main configuration.  This means that ear's will again contain their war file

Added the concept of "additional configurations" to the deployment context, which contain additional configurations creted during the deployment process.  These additional configurations are installed as separate entries in the repo.  J2EE ap
p clients are currently the only user of this feature.

author: dain
msg: Configurations now only use ConfigurationData for construction, and configuration stores produce ConfigurationData insted of GBeanData.
The serialized format of a configuration is now simply a serialized ConfigurationData.

author: dain
msg: Reenabled cmr tests.  Some tests are commented out due to unreliability
